description.narrative: The aim of this project is to catalyse systemic change in access to information processes and practice at local government level for increased local government accountability. 3 provinces have been identified due to their access to information rights def icit. information vacuums. The primary target groups include the poor marginalized and the most vulnerable in communities including women youth and children and farming and mining communities. These groups are always excluded from formal and informal lo cal participation mechanisms. This project will contribute towards the enhancement of local governance public participation access to basic services with a specific focus on sustainable development of communities and social cohesion.
